directions.text: Whisk 2 TBSP oil with parsley, rosemary, garlic ⅛ tsp salt, and ⅛ tsp pepper in a small bowl.
Combine sugar, coriander, ½ tsp salt, and ¼ tsp pepper in a medium bowl.
Pat tenderloin dry, rub with 1 TBSP oil, and coat in sugar mixture.
Grill tenderloin on the grills hot side for 6 mins per side.
Set tenderloin on cool side of grill and tent tenderloin with aluminum foil for 6 mins.
Tent tenderloin with foil on a cutting board for 10 mins.
Slice pork into ¼ inch slices and drizzle with herb mixture.
